DOC.brief_summary: It know organize cardiac rehabilitation effective improving exercise capacity coronary heart disease patient . Less known long-term result cardiac rehabilitation . Earlier study show many patient quit exercise longer attend formal rehabilitation . The investigator wish investigate effect maintenance program end rehabilitation program , compare usual care . DOC.brief_title: Exercise Training Adherence After Cardiac Rehabilitation Coronary Heart Disease Patients
DOC.criteria: coronary heart disease patient unstable angina pectoris hemodynamic significant valve disease ( > New York Heart Association class II ) pregnancy leave ventricular ejection fraction < 30 % kidney failure ( creatinin > 140 ) uncontrolled hypertension
